content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or heating and cooling?
Hi, yeah, my heater isn’t working right.
I’m sorry to hear your heater is giving you trouble. May I have your name, please, so I can better assist you?
It's George. What else do you need?
Thank you, George. Could you please provide your address so we can see when a technician is available in your area?
Thanks! We have your address as 123 Longacre Drive. When would you like us to come by to take a look at your heater? You can share your preferred date and time.
Uh, is someone available today? I really just want to know how much this is going to cost.

I understand cost is important, George! For many heater issues, we can provide a price estimate. Could you tell me more about what’s happening with your heater (is it making noise, not blowing hot air, or something else)?
It's just not turning on at all, I push the thermostat and nothing happens. Can I get a price, please?
Thank you for sharing more details! I’ll get you a price estimate right away. Please hold one moment.

Based on your description, a typical diagnostic visit for a non-working heater is $89. If repairs are needed, the technician will give you an estimate before doing any work. Would you like to schedule a visit today, or is another day better?
Okay… uhm, maybe this afternoon? Or is this all you need from me? There’s a lot of questions.
Thanks for hanging in there, George! I just need your preferred time this afternoon, and I’ll check to see if we have a technician available for you.
Is this really necessary? Never mind, I’ll call someone else.
reason: Customer became frustrated with the lengthy process and ended the conversation.
